channel.title: Da-Inn Erika Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Da-Inn Erika Lee

item.description: I am a PhD student in Biomedical Data Science at the University of Wisconsin - Madison, working in Sushmita Roy’s lab. Our lab specializes in developing computational tools to gain insight from large biological networks. My current project involves learning the organizational principles of how the DNA folds itself inside the cell, and how this in turn builds a scaffolding for gene regulatory networks.
